      Returns:

      Parameters:
      word - text with pointing
      unpointVowels - true to indicate we also want to exclude vowels
      Returns:

    • transliterate

      public static void transliterate(HebrewLetter[] letter, int current, StringBuilder output, boolean hasStress)
      Transliterates the given input. This method creates the actual transliteration.
      Parameters:
      letter - the array of letters identified so far, after the parsing has occurred.
      output - current output
      current - the current position in 'letter' to be processed
      hasStress - true to indicate a word has a stress

    • hasAnyPointing

      public static boolean hasAnyPointing(char[] inputString, int position, boolean after, char... otherMarks)
      searches for any letters provided
      Parameters:
      inputString - the input string
      position - the current position in the string
      after - true to indicate to look after, false for before
      otherMarks - the unicode characters we are look for
      Returns:
      true if all marks were matched

    • hasAllPointing

      public static boolean hasAllPointing(char[] inputString, int position, boolean after, char... otherMarks)
      searches for all letters provided
      Parameters:
      inputString - the input string
      position - the current position in the string
      after - true to indicate to look after, false for before
      otherMarks - the unicode characters we are look for
      Returns:
      true if all marks were matched

    • hasAllPointingIncludingVav

      public static boolean hasAllPointingIncludingVav(char[] inputString, int position, boolean after, char... otherMarks)
      searches for all letters provided
      Parameters:
      inputString - the input string
      position - the current position in the string
      after - true to indicate to look after, false for before
      otherMarks - the unicode characters we are look for
      Returns:
      true if all marks were matched

    • hasPointing

      public static boolean hasPointing(char[] inputString, int position, boolean after, boolean hasAllLetters, boolean includeVav, char... otherMarks)
      searches for all letters provided
      Parameters:
      inputString - the input string
      position - the current position in the string
      after - true to indicate to look after, false for before
      hasAllLetters - true to include all letters
      includeVav - true to include searching passed the Vav letter
      otherMarks - the unicode characters we are look for
      Returns:
      true if all marks were matched
